plot: An old man spends his life in solitude awaiting his grandson to come for vacation after 6 years. His arrival made him the happiest man in the world but it didn't last long as he thought.
title: Moonnam Pakkam
plot_es: An old man spends his life in solitude awaiting his grandson to come for vacation after 6 years. His arrival made him the happiest man in the world but it didn't last long as he thought.
plot_en: An old man spends his life in solitude awaiting his grandson to come for vacation after 6 years. His arrival made him the happiest man in the world but it didn't last long as he thought.
